item.title: Ep 28: How The Dudes Got Banned From Comic Con
item.description: Today, this is important: Acne, friends who got coronavirus, movies, Richard Dreyfuss, car tricks, breaking the rules in their youth, horny girls, dressing like Kevin Federline, Comic Con adventures, Kyle's under wraps car, music they fucked with back in the day, and more.
